name: Clarion Hotel Trondheim
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Trondheim in Trondheim, Norway near the Nidarosdomen Cathedral. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Akerhus Fortress landmark, Rock and Roll Museum, Bakklandet and Sverresborg. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet and copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have HDTVs, pillow top mattresses, down pillows, fluffy robes and more. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more details. Children 12 and younger stay free when they share the same room with their parents or grandparents if no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Comfort Hotel Trondheim
description: The pet-friendly Comfort Hotel Trondheim is conveniently located in the city center, close to many popular attractions and landmarks. This hotel is near the Archbishops Palace, Nidaros Cathedral and the Trondheim Symphony. The Norwegian University of Science and Technology is just minutes away. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free Sunday brunch, meeting space, bicycle rentals, a convenience store, currency exchange and more. In addition to standard amenities, spacious guest rooms come with flat-screen TVs, hair dryers and cable TVs. Wireless high-speed Internet is available throughout the property.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Grand Olav
description: Get together at the Clarion Collection Hotel Grand Olav in Trondheim, Norway. Our location in the city center puts us close to attractions like the OlavsHallen concert hall, Old City Bridge, Nidaros Cathedral, Royal Residence in Trondheim, Munkholmen, and Bakklandet, a neighborhood full of historic houses, shops and cafes. Amenities include a free organic breakfast and light evening buffet. Coffee, tea and fruit are available 24 hours a day for all our guests. Business travelers will appreciate conveniences like access to copy and fax services. All guest rooms have coffee makers and DVD players. Some rooms are air conditioned. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Prinsen
description: Quality Hotel Prinsen is a full-service hotel with a warm and informal ambience, located in the heart of downtown Trondheim. The hotel is centrally located near businesses, shops, and restaurants, and is also a great jumping off point for exploring cultural and historic Trondheim. Here you will find modern rooms decorated in delicate, soothing tones, as well as one of largest conference centres in the city.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Augustin
description: The smoke-free Quality Hotel Augustin is ideally located near the Stiftsgarden, the royal residence in Trondheim. Additional attractions nearby include the Olavshallen concert hall, Nidaros Cathedral, Norwegian University of Science and Technology and the Trondheim Vaernes Airport. Enjoy hotel amenities such as free full breakfast buffet, meeting space, a public computer with Internet, free WiFi, free coffee and tea throughout the day and copy, print and fax machines. All guest rooms have free WiFi, cable TVs and hair dryers. Our friendly staff looks forward to serving you soon.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Solsiden
description: Scandic Solsiden is situated in Trondheim and is close to the area's popular attractions. The various facilities this trendy hotel offers include a rooftop terrace, free bicycle rental and a 24-hour reception. This modern hotel provides a ticket service, luggage storage and a concierge. For trendy travellers a bar provides a hip setting for an after-meal drink. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the local nightlife. Every modern room at Scandic Solsiden Hotel offers a refrigerator and all the essentials for a comfortable stay. All have an in-room closet, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The area surrounding Scandic Solsiden Hotel Trondheim is popular for its shopping and eateries. It is within walking distance of Trondheim Central Railway Station, which allows easy access in and around Trondheim.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Park
description: The pet-friendly Comfort Hotel Park is conveniently located just minutes from the Archbishops Palace, Nidaros Cathedral and Monks Island. This hotel is also near the Tyholt Tower, which looms high over the city, providing spectacular views of the surrounding area. The tower also features a revolving restaurant. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free coffee, a sauna and hot tub, a newsstand, laundry facilities and copy, print and fax machines. Spacious guest rooms come with kitchenettes, refrigerators, desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. We look forward to having you as our guest.Choice Hotels

name: Britannia Hotel
description: Dating back to 1870, this elegant hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Trondheim Central Station. It provides luxury spa facilities and 4 restaurants. Wi-Fi is free. Britannia Hotel’s rooms mix classic décor with modern comforts. All rooms have a writing desk, flat-screen TV and tea/coffee facilities. Guests can enjoy a 24-hour room service. The Britannia Spa & Wellness Centre offers special treatments, massages and saunas. A swimming pool, minerals pool and gym are also found on site. Britannia Hotel is located in the city center in walking distance to shops and restaurants. The 11th-century Nidaros Cathedral is 500 metres away.

name: Quality Hotel Panorama
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel Panorama in Tiller, NO near the Rosenborg Ballklub, Sverresborg Trondelag Folke museum, Nidaros Cathedral and the Norwegian University of Science and Technology. Our pet-friendly hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, a hotel lounge and bar, a sauna, a restaurant and meeting space, to mention a few. Guest rooms come with irons, ironing boards and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Panorama. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available for a small fee, contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Lerkendal
description: Scandic Lerkendal is set in Trondheim and is close to nearby sightseeing spots, such as Norwegian University of Science and Technology. Guests can also make the most of complimentary internet throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, luggage storage and an express check-in and check-out feature. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. The rooms include ironing facilities and a desk. Scandic Lerkendal's restaurant is open for breakfast, providing guests with an enjoyable dining experience not far from their room. In the evening, guests can relax in the lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also available close by. Trondheim's popular attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to the hotel, with Lerkendal Stadion just moments away. It is within a short stroll from Rosenborg BK.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Royal Garden Hotel, Trondheim
description: Centrally located, Radisson Blu Royal Garden Hotel Trondheim allows for easy access to Trondheim's main retail areas and tourist attractions. The multiple facilities this modern hotel has to offer include a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and an express check-in and check-out feature. There are 298 rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Garden, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Those staying at Radisson Blu Royal Garden Hotel can indulge in a drink at Galleriet Bar & Restaurant, before enjoying a meal at 73 Bar & Restaurant. Guests can also try one of the various bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Trondheim's attractions, including The Old Town Bridge and Stiftsgarden, are within easy walking distance of Radisson Blu Trondheim. Nidaros Cathedral is within walking distance.Revato

name: Scandic Nidelven
description: Scandic Nidelven is situated in Trondheim and is close to the area's popular attractions. It also offers complimentary wireless internet. This 5-star hotel provides a coffee bar, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Welcoming and professional team members are available 24 hours a day. The modern rooms at Scandic Nidelven include a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They are also equipped with heating and a hair dryer. Each morning, guests can sit down to breakfast at Broen Lunch & Pianobar or Nidelven. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Nidelven is close to Trondheim Central Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Trondheim and its surrounding areas. There are a range of nightlife, shopping and dining options minutes away.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Bakeriet
description: This hotel is set in a former 19th-century bakery, just 350 metres from Trondheim Central Station. Room rates include a popular breakfast buffet, WiFi and leisure facility access. Best Western Plus Hotel Bakeriet’s rooms have modern bathrooms, as well as cable TV channels. Guests can help themselves to free tea and coffee all day. In keeping with Best Western Plus Bakeriet’s history, the inner courtyard café makes fresh bread each morning. Guests can use the hotel gym, located on the bottom floor. Nidaros Cathedral and the Archbishop’s Palace are 10 minutes’ walk from Best Western Plus Hotel Bakeriet.
